tool_description: World countries available in multiple languages, with associated alpha-2, alpha-3, and numeric codes as defined by the ISO 3166 standard
title: World countries

api_list.name: get a country by alpha-2 numeric code
api_list.description:
get a  country by alpha-2 numeric codes ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code are two-letter country codes defined in ISO 3166-1, 

part of the ISO 3166 standard published by the International Organization for Standardization (ISO),
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-countries.p.rapidapi.com/{alpha_2_code}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-countries.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: get all countries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-countries.p.rapidapi.com/all"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-countries.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
